channel.title: tir
channel.description: "Today I Read:" a collection of the little things you read each day. Cherish them!

item.title: In Flanders Fields
item.description: Poem about WWI: "Loved and were loved, and now we lie, / In Flanders fields.'

item.title: Iphigenia in Forest Hills
item.description: Unjust suspicion and uneven legal representation lconvict a Bukharan woman for her husband's murder

item.title: Lisa in Emily in Little Paris
item.description: Simulation all the way down: fake attendance, fake show, fake Paris. cc "Why Is Everything So Ugly?"

item.title: The Imperial Supreme Court
item.description: The Supreme Court is consolidating power from lower courts and legislatures, without unifying legal rationale.

item.title: Area of Isolation
item.description: Fun fiction. Good description of drunkenness.

item.title: Cultivating depth and stillness in research
item.description: Reflections on and hacks (reasonable ones!) for personal productivity.

item.title: Butterflies
item.description: Lepidoptery at Marienbad: freewheeling pleasures of butterfly-collecting.

item.title: A Manual for Cleaning Women
item.description: Short story. Berkeley. "Ter, I don't want to die at all, actually."

item.title: Hildegard of Bingen Composes the Cosmos
item.description: On her late appropriation as an icon.

item.title: Line in the Sand
item.description: Can a celebrity-architect ethically contribute to NEOM, the Saudi line-city?

item.title: Notes on creative context
item.description: Tending to kernels of ideas, managing motivation and blocks.
